paragraph.value: Most errors in our annotated corpus are related to person deixis, specifically gender marking in the Russian translation, and the T-V distinction between informal and formal you (Latin "tu" and "vos"). From Table 3, we see that the
non � riconosciuto come comando interno o esterno, error category related to deixis in our annotated corpus is the inconsistency of

non � riconosciuto come comando interno o esterno, when translating second person pronouns.

It appears that there might be an issue with the command path in the text. However, since these are not specific values, comparative expressions, or superlative/aggregated expressions, they should remain unchanged according to the task description. Therefore, no replacements were made for the path string.
